title: GoldenAge Coin
author: GoldenAge Coin
created_time: July 26, 2022, 09:54:44 AMLast edit: August 22, 2022, 08:02:38 AM by GoldenAge Coin
content: Telegram      -      Twitter      -      Facebook      -      LinkedIn Bitcoin Musk Team is offering 15K USD Worth $BTCMUSK Tokens, through this Bounty Program. This Bounty Campaign will start on the 25/07/2022 and proceed till the 19/08/2022.Every single participant is required to submit their reports latest by closing of "FRIDAY" 23:59 UTC, if anyone crosses this deadline of report submission, his/her report will not be accepted or given rewards for it, as the week is considered from Monday to Friday for work.The days of Saturday and Sunday are kept for checking the results, so the final date of report submission would remain Friday only, if anyone submits their reports on Saturday or Sunday, it will not be considered at all, so please do not request it, not going to be considered at all.1st Week = 25/07/2022 - 29/07/2022 (COMPLETED)2nd Week = 01/08/2022 - 05/08/2022 (COMPLETED)3rd Week = 08/08/2022 - 12/08/2022 (COMPLETED)4th Week = 15/08/2022 - 19/08/2022 (COMPLETED)Facebook Campaign (35% of the Bounty Campaign)Twitter Campaign (35% of the Bounty Campaign)Telegram Campaign (10% of the Bounty Campaign)YouTube Campaign (10% of the Bounty Campaign)Article Campaign (10% of the Bounty Campaign)THE RULEZ:1. Every participants must join our official group in Telegram Group HERE. Do not leave the group before the end of this campaign.2. Every participant must sign up using the given proper form. Submission of an application on the thread without proper signup will result in no match within our counting application.3. Bitcoin Musk Team reserves the right to adjust the reward amount, depending on the number of applicants in each of the bounty campaigns.4. Any application with improper information will be disqualified without notice (i.e. multiple alts, scam and etc...)5. Please check you Wallet address before submitting, this cannot be changed till the end of the bounty.6. When the bounty ends, you will have 7 days for any questions/complaints.7. You can request changes to update your weekly rewards status within 7 days after each week's review (above-mentioned campaigns). We will not make any adjustments if the deadline is passed.8. Weekly campaigns rewards will be updated every Sunday on or before 23.59 UTC time.If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any bounty rewards. All rights reserved by Bitcoin Musk, and can make any changes to rules or terms and conditions, if applicable.For Bounty related support during the bounty campaign, to ask questions about bounty please reach us via private message here at any time and wait for the response. By signing up for the bounty, you're accepting these above termsRules:1. Account must be at least 3 months old.2. Participant should like and share official Facebook page: https://facebook.com/bitcoinmusk/3. Minimum 3 posts and 2 shares weekly with Hashtags #Bitcoinmusk #BTCMUSK #NFT #Web3.0 #Blockchain required to get the rewards.4. Every week you need to submit the report on this bounty thread.NOTE: Minimum (Total 5) 3 original posts and 2 shares must be done with above mentioned Hashtags during the week before the report submitting deadline.Rewards:1. 1-2000 Followers: 2 Stakes per week.2. 2001-3999 Followers: 4 Stakes per week.3. 4000+ Followers: 6 Stakes per week.Reporting Format (must reply to thread)Code:Week: 1 (mm/dd/yyyy)-(mm/dd/yyyy)BitcoinTalk Name: Your Facebook Account Name:Your Facebook Profile Link:Links to the Shares&Likes:1- (mm/dd): 2- (mm/dd): How to join:Rules:1. You must follow the official twitter account: https://twitter.com/Bitcoinelonmusk2. You must retweet and like at least 2 latest tweets by Bitcoinmusk account using hashtags #Bitcoinmusk #BTCMUSK #NFT #Web3.0 #Blockchain (use all these tags in every post) per week.3. You must tweet at least 2 of your original tweet about Bitcoinmusk per week and use hashtags mentioned above. 4. Twitter accounts must be cryptocurrency related, real and have at least 90% of real followers (twitter audit).5. Every week you need to submit the report on this bounty thread.NOTE: Minimum (Total 4) 2 original posts and 2 shares must done with above mentioned Hashtags during the week before the report submitting deadline. Rewards:1. 1-2000 Followers: 2 Stakes per week.2. 2001-3999 Followers: 4 Stakes per week.3. 4000+ Followers: 6 Stakes per week.Reporting Format (must reply to thread)Code:Week: 1 (mm/dd/yyyy)-(mm/dd/yyyy)BitcoinTalk Name: Your Twitter Account Name:Your Twitter Profile Link: Links to the Original Tweets: 1- (mm/dd): 2- (mm/dd):  How to join:Rules:1. You must STAY in the Telegram Group until the end of the campaign calculation to receive your stakes. Rewards:1. Join the telegram group - 2 StakesHow to join:Rules:Produce a good review video of the Bitcoinmusk project by following the below norms:1. All content will be judged by the criteria: quality, views and effects.2. Video must be at least 2 minutes, videos shorter are not accepted.3. Your channel should be at least 2 months old.4. Your channel must have at least 500 subscribers and video must get 500 views to qualify. 5. You should make the video in English language or any other major languages.6. You will receive a reward at the end of the week, depending on the quality and popularity of your work.7. The video must be original. Copying graphics, text and other content are not allowed. (You can use official images, logos, images posted on websites, ANN-topic, Twitter and Facebook).8. To prove authorship, our ANN Thread link must be added to the video description along with your username on Bitcointalk.Rewards:1. Low Quality: 2 stakes2. Average Quality: 4 stakes3. High Quality: 6 stakes4. 5000+ Subscribers: 1 stakes5. 10000+ Subscribers: 2 stakes6. 50000+ Subscribers: 3 stakesHow to join:Rules:1. Blogs and Sites eligible for this bounty campaign are:-Hackernoon-Medium-Quora-Reddit-Steemit2. The blog/article must be focused on the relevant topic. It must convey positively about Bitcoinmusk project.3. It must be written in your own words. If you copy any content from site or whitepaper, then it is going to be rejected.3. Blog posts must have at least 350 words.4. The posting account must have at least 500 followers/subscribers.5. Only original content will be accepted, rest are going to be rejected immediately.6. Articles must be available till the end of this campaign. Removal/deletion of post prior to that will result in disqualification and no stakes.7. The article must have a link to our website, telegram channel and Bitcointalk Ann thread.8. URL Shortener links (TinyURL, Bit.ly, etc.) will not be valid.9. Please provide your Bitcointalk username and profile at the end of the article so that the authenticity can be verified and easy to define stakes for you. Rewards: 1. Low Quality: 2 stakes2. Average Quality: 4 stakes3. High Quality: 6 stakesHow to join:
